Week of October 7, 2013 The latest Industry News, Features, and Blog Posts for goPivotal.com
Featured>>
>> Recap: The Cloud Foundry Conference - Pivotal HD as a Cloud Foundry Service <http://bitcast-a.v1.o1.sjc1.bitgravity.com/greenplum/CloudFoundry_Video/Ashwin_Kumar.m4v>
>> Ashwin Kumar, Principal Software Engineer at Pivotal presents Pivotal HD as a Cloud Foundry Service. Pivotal HD is the world's fastest Hadoop distribution, leveraging the mature SQL query engine known as HAWQ. Watch Now <http://bitcast-a.v1.o1.sjc1.bitgravity.com/greenplum/CloudFoundry_Video/Ashwin_Kumar.m4v>.
Latest Blog Posts>>
>> Case Study: Analyzing Retail/e-Commerce 318x Faster on HAWQ +MADlib In e-commerce or traditional store retail, information about purchase behavior is key to managing the profit and loss of the business. For one of our customers, they saw how HAWQ could improve the speed of analysis by over 318x and reduce analytic queries from 24 days to 6 minutes.>> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/case-studies-2/case-study-analyzing-retaile-commerce-318x-faster-on-hawq-madlib>
>> Analyzing Raw Twitter Data using HAWQ and PXF Twitter is a great way to get a general feel of public sentiment about a particular product or idea. Using HAWQ and the PXF framework, users can read raw JSON data to extract value directly out of the raw JSON-based Twitter stream. >> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/products/analyzing-raw-twitter-data-using-hawq-and-pxf>
